name: Introduction to Engineering
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of Engineering, covering topics such as problem solving, engineering design, and engineering ethics.

name: Introduction to Software Engineering
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of Software Engineering, covering topics such as software design, software development, and software testing.

name: Computer Science I
description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of Computer Science, covering topics such as data structures, algorithms, and programming languages.

name: Computer Science II
description: This course builds on the fundamentals learned in Computer Science I, covering topics such as recursion, sorting algorithms, and software design patterns.

name: Software Design
description: This course focuses on the principles of software design, covering topics such as object-oriented programming, design patterns, and software architecture.

name: Software Testing and Quality Assurance
description: This course covers the principles of software testing and quality assurance, covering topics such as unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing.

name: Software Project Management
description: This course covers the principles of software project management, covering topics such as project planning, resource management, and risk management.
